name: Hotel Domstern

reviews.text: Just by accident I had to take the Thalys-train from Paris to Cologne (Köln). Bloody expensive. I missed the train and the night in the Hotel Domstern in Cologne. Very politely they sent me an e-mail, telling how worried they were about my no-show. Of course they had to charge a certain % of the room rate. I was amazed by their positive attitude and of course I apologized. On my way back, I wanted to stay with them.
reviews.title: Easy to reach, friendly to stay

reviews.text: The booker remembered me, gave me a decent room and deducted part of the fee i already paid two weeks before.
reviews.title: The attention to detail was amazing

reviews.text: The staff was soooo friendly, The breakfast was a surprise: every morning there was a different theme-buffet. And on your table you found a leaflet, telling you what´s going on and what to do in this city full of culture. And kölsch!
reviews.title: The #1 rating is correct!

reviews.text: I stayed in the smallest and the cheapest room, just opposite the reception. In European way the room was of course very tiny, with no view. But it was very well equipped, and one of the handsome receptionists offered me a portable airconditioner with no charge.
reviews.title: The little extras make all the difference

reviews.text: I never saw any other rooms, and at the time they were refurbishing the suites upstairs. Maybe I`d stay up there one day.
reviews.title: Best hotel I haved stayed in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Comfy, warm, welcoming place. Friendly and very helpful staff, who did a good job at making our stay a pleasant one. Booked double room, but got upgraded to tripple room that had a small table & couch sitting area. It's a very small hotel, but has an elevator which was important as my wife has walking problems. Rooms are small, but adequate. Being a non-smoking hotel makes all the difference! Hotel is very close (easy walk!) to the main trainstation and inner city, but it's very well insulated against noise.
reviews.title: Highly Recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast menu had a large selection and was varied every day by having specialities from different countries. With breakfast also came a free flyer with the day's weather forecast and local attractions / cultural events that were on that day. Wow!
reviews.title: Wish we could have stayed longer

reviews.text: The automatic coffee/hot chocolate maker is fantastic, and free to use. Highly recommend this place. They deserve more stars.
reviews.title: Great value for this price. Staff is very...

reviews.text: We spent 3 nights in Hotel Domstern. The hotel is within easy walking distance of the main railway station (Koln Hauptbahnhof) and of all the main attractions of the city centre, including the Cathedral, Old Town and the main shopping area. We had booked a junior suite, which was spacious, well-furnished and spotlessly clean, as was the sizeable bathroom with both bath and separate shower. The staff were friendly, welcoming and helpful at all times. The buffet breakfast was excellent with wide and varied choice of cereals, breads, preserves, meats, cheeses, fruit, etc. The hotel even produced a daily newsheet with weather details, tips for entertainment and sightseeing, useful info such as local pharmacy, supermarket, etc. Our stay at the Domstern was a real pleasure - I only wish it could have been longer.
reviews.title: A gem in Cologne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great value for this price. Staff is very friendly and the breakfast is absolutely amazing and varies from day to day with a country themed offer of delicious things. Loved to stay there
reviews.title: Small but perfectly formed!

reviews.text: This is a small hotel that excels in everything it does. It is spotlessly clean and unfailingly helpful. The staff were warm and helpful and clearly had thought through so many small details. The breakfast was included which makes a nice change from the big boys and was full of fresh local produce with a different theme each day.
reviews.title: This is a small hotel that excels in...
EXCELLENT!
reviews.text: The rooms are not huge but the website was very clear about this so it was not a surprise. They were perfectly well appointed and for the price difference from the major chains, I will definitely stay here again. There is free wireless and easy access to an honesty bar, iron etc. The location is very handy for the main station (no noise), Dom and city centre.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, it is the staff that really make this hotel top notch. They prepared for my late arrival and were always keen to say hello. That made a big difference.
reviews.title: Head to Hotel Domstern if you want good service and a convenient locality

reviews.text: Just a couple of lines to thank all the staff of Domstern Hotel for the great service offered during my stay (August 28-September 4). This hotel is definitely worthy of the highest recommendation.
reviews.title: Comfy and cosy in Cologne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at the Hotel Domstern for 4 x nights and experienced top service from friendly staff. The double room was a good size and we had access to a fan, iron and a small fridge. This Hotel is within walking distance from the main station and the town square. It is also close to a laundry and supermarket. The breakfast was buffet and delicious and you will find this hotel in a quiet street.
reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant hotel where we would gladly stay again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After reading trip advisor before I went, I booked this hotel based on it's No. 1 rating in Cologne but I was disappointed because it didn't live up to this...reception staff did not have good english and nobody carried our bags whereas similar priced hotels with small rooms and small bathrooms with same pricing structure did do this. The shower was so small that a few times I leant on the lever and the shower turned off. Then when I got out the whole toilet was completely wet, it was all so small. The hairdryer was pretty much useless and I had to hold my finger on the button to keep it on and because it took forever to dry my hair, my finger got so sore, I gave up. Breakfast was ok but nothing to rave about. Staff friendly but the friendliness didn't seem genuine.
reviews.title: Not worthy of No.1 ranked hotel in Cologne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having stayed in Cologne on four previous occasions, we never expected to find a hotel with such very high standards.In this day and age when excellant service, good food, high standards of cleanliness, and an overwhelming willingness to help you to enjoy your stay, are only too rare. The Domstern, effortly supplies all of these things, with friendly help and advice on how to get the best from your stay.
reviews.title: This wonderful hotel is just a Gem, owners who care, with very high standards all round.

reviews.text: The lower rate rooms are not large , but perfectly adequate, and there is a choice of two larger rooms if you prefere this. The room was modern and very clean, and had everything we needed.
reviews.title: Outstanding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfasts were well above the standards you would expect for a 3 star hotel. The variety was good , with locally produced items, and also home made specialities too. On each day they provided different foods from various european countries as a theme. At breakfast there was a daily information booklet telling of the various things in Cologne happening that day. We will be returning, and would fully recomend this hotel Brian Davis & John King.
reviews.title: FANTASTIC HOTEL! Great location and great staff! There are other hotels, but why?

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this hotel. The hosts are wonderful, the breakfast was large and diverse, the location is a 5 minute walk to the Cathedral, Old Town, and the Rheine, and the room was large (I booked a 3 person room even though there were only 2 of us because the hotel was running a terrific special rate for a minimum 3 night stay), clean and quiet. Manfred helped me solve a travel problem. The hosts also have great recommendations for dining in the area. My daughter and I loved this hotel. We definitely would stay here again.
reviews.title: Great Find, Exceptional Place and Conviently Located

description: Just a few steps from the famous Cologne Cathedral, main station, historic city center, shopping area and not far from the trade fair, you will find Hotel Domstern in a quiet side street. We offer newly renovated rooms, free wifi, parking, only nonsmoking rooms, elevator and our extended breakfast buffet until 11 am and even 12 noon during weekends. We are proud and humbled getting the "Travellers choice award 2010" from our guests for our personal service!
